name: Turn White
description:
Players need to observe, try and turn all the water droplets into white within a limited number of steps.
- An entirely original play, a double challenge of intelligence and patience.
- 4 different styles of chapters and wonderful themes.
- 96 different levels, which fully satisfied the players' exploration intention.
- Different water droplets have different directions.
This game is inspired by traditional black and white chess. Believe this original game can give players a new puzzle game experience fully.
